author: Al Jazeera
title: African nationals 'mistreated, evicted' in China over coronavirus
description: African envoys lodge complaint with Beijing over 'discrimination and stigmatisation' against African nationals in China.
content:
African students and expatriates in China are reportedly being evicted from their homes and mistreated over fears they could spread the novel coronavirus.
African ambassadors in China have written to the country's foreign minister over what they call discrim… [+3952 chars]
